description: Fear of being too comfortable has been the motivation for expansion. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Goodstuph: Turning a one-woman social marketing agency into one with 180 staff in 5 countries
title_page: Goodstuph: Turning a one-woman social marketing agency into one with 180 staff in 5 countries | The Straits Times
maintext:
It is not often – never before, actually – I get a “pretty please” attached to a request for an interview.
But here it is, in the e-mail: “Will you have lunch with us pretty please?”
